<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Delete a silence</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/alertmanager/grafana/api/v2/silence/<<UID>>"}></MethodEndpoint>



Remove an existing silence to resume alert notifications for the affected matchers.


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"UID","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Unique identifier of the silence.","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

The silence was successfully deleted.

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

The specified silence UID does not exist.

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
